subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Liverpool scored a goal in stoppage time to beat Everton, 2-1, in a dramatic Merseyside derby yesterday at Goodison Park as host Everton ended the match with nine men.
snippet: Liverpool scored a goal in stoppage time to beat Everton, 2-1, in a dramatic Merseyside derby yesterday at Goodison Park as host Everton ended the match with nine men.
